value: Write a program that contains a variable name as firstName and assign the value of your first name??
What is the output of the following code?

text:
var b="Hello this is my ‘Dell Laptop’ ";
console.log(b);

value: output: Hello this is my ‘Dell Laptop’;
What is the error in this code?

text: var b="Hello this is my "Dell Laptop""console.log(b);

value:
Here you will get 
SyntaxError: Unexpected identifier
Because we used the same double quotes inside to say Dell Laptop…
